name: THE PHISHER
description: The game allows the user to overcome a series of obstacles to beat our criminal 'the phisher'. We have included lots of dead ends, mini games and guess the password opportunities by linking them with an instagram page @casuallylurking to find clues about the criminal. This allows the user to learn about password strength, sharing personal info online and catfishing. The dead ends lead to some hilarious scenarios to put a smile on your face!
